description: This file defines a set of agents, tools, and a team for an AI-powered startup management system. It includes the setup of knowledge base, multiple agents with specific roles and instructions, and a coordinating team that delegates tasks among agents. The code also demonstrates interaction with the team through message prompts.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF data into a vector database for retrieval.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, instructions, and tools.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: A team class that coordinates multiple agents and manages interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data from specified path.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a message to the team and streams responses, including intermediate steps.
